amendatorysection.catchline: Behavioral health screenings; legislative intent; optional screening.
amendatorysection.para: It is the intent of the Legislature that behavioral health screenings be offered by physicians at the time of childhood physicals. The physician shall explain that such screening is optional. The results of behavioral health screenings and any related documents shall not be included in the child's school record and shall not be provided to the child's school or to any other person or entity without the express consent of the child's parent or legal guardian.
